summary: A police lt. is ordered to stop investigating deadly crime boss Mr. Brown, because he hasn't been able to get any hard evidence against him. He then goes after Brown's girlfriend who despises him, for information instead.
cast: Cornel Wilde|Richard Conte|Brian Donlevy|Jean Wallace|Robert Middleton|Lee Van Cleef|Earl Holliman|Helen Walker|Jay Adler|John Hoyt|Ted de Corsia|Helene Stanton|Roy Gordon|Whit Bissell|Steve Mitchell|Baynes Barron|James McCallion|Tony Michaels|Brian O'Hara|Rita Gould|Bruce Sharpe|Michael Mark|Philip Van Zandt|Donna Drew|Eve Bernhardt|Steve Carruthers|Jack Chefe|James Conaty|Russell Custer|Tom Ferrandini|Joe Garcio|Jakob Gimpel|Herbert Lytton|Ray Spiker
director: Director: Joseph H. Lewis (as Joseph Lewis)
title: Agente especial
